tweet.text: On March 3, 1932, Secretary of State Stimson dedicated the Foreign Service Memorial Tablet, with the names of 65 U.S. diplomats and consuls who lost their lives under heroic or tragic circumstances. https://t.co/wdqLa45P1R #twitterstorians @StateDG
tweet.html: On March 3, 1932, Secretary of State Stimson dedicated the Foreign Service Memorial Tablet, with the names of 65 U.S. diplomats and consuls who lost their lives under heroic or tragic circumstances. go.usa.gov/xQN6A #twitterstorians @StateDG
